spotlight.title: This Month: Klutzz
spotlight.intro: Once a month, we honor one member whose efforts & spirit guide the guild onward together.
body: This month we lift the lantern's light & let it rest on Klutzz in sight
Klutzz arrives with faithful tread, guiding new paths where steps are led, answering questions with presence clear as belonging settles gently here.
In gathered hours, awareness stays, conversation warmed in subtle ways, small pauses eased with careful grace so shared play keeps an easy pace.
spotlight.conclusion: Cheers move softly, carried through, kindness woven where gardens grew across Mōchirīī's paths in flow, a steady warmth we all can know.
